roundRules.general1:
Round Rules:

  • 5 questions per team
  • Questions are not passable
  • +10 points for a correct answer with 0 negative markings
roundRules.buzzer1:
Round Rules:

  • 20 questions will be displayed on the screen
  • First to buzz gets to answer
  • 20 points for correct answer
  • -5 points for incorrect answer
roundRules.rapid:
Round Rules:

  • Each team gets 90 seconds to answer 10 questions.
  • +10 for each correct answer. No negative marking.
  • Team can pass on questions to display next question.
roundRules.jeopardy:
Round Rules:

  • A table of questions from different categories with different point values is displayed.
  • Teams select a category and point value to answer.
  • + or - the points of the chosen question for a correct/incorrect answer.
roundRules.general2:
Round Rules:

  • each team will be asked 5 questions each.
  • 10 points for correct answer
  • question are passable with (5-3-2-1) on each passes
roundRules.topic:
Round Rules:

  • 5 topics will be displayed where each team can choose one topics
  • each topics contains 5 questions
  • +10 for a correct answer with no negative marking.
